channel.title: Melodic Sessions by Prototype 202: Progressive House Podcast
channel.description: A monthly talk free DJ mix of all the best melodic progressive House, Trance and Progressive Breaks, featuring slabs of quality and uplifting aural stimulation with a sprinkling of shimmering vocals on top. Please rate this podcast and visit the www.prototype202.com website for all tracklistings and buy links for all the featured tracks
channel.itunes:subtitle: A monthly talk free mix of all the best melodic progressive House, Trance and Progressive Breaks
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast of deep progressive house and trance, featuring slabs of quality melodic and uplifting aural stimulation with a sprinkling of shimmering vocals on top. Releases from labels including Anjunadeep, Silk Royal Records, Macarize, Anjunadeep and artists including Ad Brown, Jaytech, Andrew Bayer, Soundprank, Deadmau5, Stan Kolev, Loquai, Above and Beyond, Peter Illias and much much more. Please rate this podcast and visit the Prototype202 website for all tracklistings and buy links for all the featured tracks. Spread the love for Melodic EDM.
channel.itunes:author: Various Artists

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Melodic Sessions by Prototype 202 - Progressive House and Trance Podcast

channel.itunes:keywords: Progressive House, Progressive Trance, Vocal Trance, Trance, Melodic House, , progressive trance mix, progressive house mix, Chilled Trance, Electronic, Melodic Trance, Progressive, Deep Progressive, Progressive Breaks, Ibiza trance, Ibiza balaeric, Ibiza, Deadmau5, Silk Royal Recordings, Silk Digital, Anjunadeep, Particles, Macarize

item.title: Warm Air Mix - Melodic House and Progressive Mix by Protoype202
item.itunes:subtitle: June brings deep house, melodic house and Ibiza beachside trance all mixed into a summer warmup session for your listening pleasure. Featuring tracks and remixes from Jaytech, Andrew Bayer, Gabriel Batz, Above and Beyond, Martin Roth and Deadmau5. Track of the month is the awesome Dynamis by Terry da Libra. Melodic fans enjoy the podcast.
item.itunes:summary:
June brings deep house, melodic house and Ibiza beachside trance all mixed into a summer warmup session for your listening pleasure. Featuring tracks and remixes from Jaytech, Andrew Bayer, Gabriel Batz, Martin Roth and Deadmau5. Track of the month is the awesome Dynamis by Terry da Libra. Melodic fans enjoy the podcast.

item.title: Poolside Mix - Deep House and Progressive Mix by Protoype202
item.itunes:subtitle: May brings a deep house tinged mix to wash away those April showers and bring the sun out ready for May. New tracks and remixes from Nigel Good, Martin Roth, EDX, Guy Gerber, Andrew Bayer and more. Track of the month is the fantastic Matao remix of Olympus by Mindset but a close second is Guy Gerbers, One Day in May, good work fella's.

item.title: Spring Melt - Vocal and Progressive Trance Mix by Protoype202
item.itunes:subtitle: April 2012's Sunset Sessions podcast brings beautiful vocal trance and progressive sounds. With new tracks and remixes from Johan Vilborg, Cosmic Gate, David Folkebrandt, Nick Stoynoff, Eximinds and Max Graham. Track of the month is the awesome Kobana Remix of Alien by Poison Pro and Miusha . Enjoy!

item.title: Dawn Breaks - Progressive Trance Mix by Protoype202
item.itunes:subtitle: Progressive breaks make a return this month. Some deep beautiful melodic breakbeat productions from Hybrid, Aeron Aether, Loquai, Eximinds Ad Brown and more. Track of the month is Enjoy This from Tom Lue with an awesome remix by Gregory Essayan. Blast from the past comes courtesy of Nick Muir with Forge on Bedrock Classics

item.title: High Tide - Progressive Trance Mix by Protoype202
item.itunes:subtitle: February brings another selection of beautiful melodic, progressive house - with new tracks and remixes from D-Nox and Beckers, Zack Roth, Stan Kolev, SHato and Moonbeam. Track of the month is the beautiful melodic drifter It's Just a Bad Dream from Deep Fog out on Mistique Music. Sit back relax and enjoy !

item.title: Mists - Progressive Trance Mix by Protoype202
item.itunes:subtitle: Melodic Sessions bring you another month of the best melodic deep and progressive tunes around. This month sees new tracks from Nick Warren, Peter Illias, Jacob Henry, Soundprank, and more. Tune of the month is Andy Moors awesome melodic gem Halcyon, with Alexey Sonars Flashback and Nick Warrens Rumbletump all hot on its heels. Blast from the past is Probspots I'll Kill For You sounding as fresh as ever. Enjoy!
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Breaking Fall - Progressive Breaks Mix by Protoype202
item.itunes:subtitle: Autumn brings Breaking Fall, awesome melodic breakbeats, chords and synth lines from Hybrid, Sed and Dream Logic alongside the usual from the likes of Schodt, Ad Brown, Audien and Claes Rosen. Track of the month is the beautiful progressive breaks of Funk Harmony Park with Bianco Soleil and Moecule

item.title: Bonus FB Mix - Melodic House mix by Prototype202
item.itunes:subtitle: October brings an FB bonus mix with some tracks chosen by FB listeners thrown in the mix for good measure. Big THANKS to Subash and Ricardo. Also playing plenty of new tracks including 2Night the awesome new track from Eric Prydz. Enjoy!
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Fade to Black Mix - Progressive and Tech House mix by Prototype202
item.itunes:subtitle: October brings an Indian Summer here in the UK and to celebrate we have a mix of the melodic with an indie-electro tinge. With new tracks and remixes from Josh Gabriel, Super8 and Tab, Kay-D, Eelkje Klein and classics from Courtney Tidwell and Gui Boratto. Track of the month the beautiful piano tinged Flashpoint by Rodrigo Deem. Enjoy!

item.title: Ibiza Sunset Mix - Progressive and Tech House mix by Prototype202
item.itunes:subtitle: September 2011 brings a build down sunset mix for fans of uplifting melodic tech house with a deeper feel. Featuring awesome tracks and remixes from Tom Middleton, Suffused, Sasha, and Layo and Bushwacka. Classic track is Steve Mills with Let Me Go Higher from 2008 and Track of the Month is Jason Van Wyk and Audien with Someday. Enjoy!

item.title: Balearic Breeze - Balearic House and Breaks mix by Prototype202
item.itunes:subtitle: July 2011 brings a melodic mix for lovers of melodic and balaeric deep progressive house and breaks. Featuring awesome tracks and remixes from Passenger 10, Soundprank, Duderstadt and Elfsong. Track of the month Passenger 10 with Come Back, with a beautiful chilled melodic house number and kicking off the mix this month. Enjoy!

July 2011 brings a melodic mix for lovers of melodic and balaeric deep progressive house and breaks. Featuring awesome tracks and remixes from Passenger 10, Soundprank,Duderstadt and Elfsong. Track of the month Passenger 10 with Come Back, with a beautiful chilled melodic house number and kicking off the mix this month. Enjoy!

item.title: Dusk - Progressive House and Trance mix by Prototype202
item.itunes:subtitle: June 2011 brings hot summer days and a progressive trance mix featuring tracks and remixes from Proff, Cressida, Sun Jellie. Hazem Beltagui and several of the standout tracks from the awesome Solarstone compilation Electronic Architecture 2, Pure class once again from the Solarstone guys. Track of the month is the awesome One Of Us by Peter Illias and classic track is True Love by George Acosta from Jan 2010. Enjoy!

item.title: Rise - Terrace Mix - Progressive House Trance mix by Prototype202
item.itunes:subtitle: This months melodic mix Part 1 is a sunset selection to wash away those winter blues with beautiful synth laden tunes from Ilya Maluev, Quarrel, Cosmic Gate. Aeron Aether, Schodt, Sundriver and many more including a remastered version of the classic Treatment Declined by Andy Moor from 2003. Enjoy!
